snippet: The market has turned higher this week after moving largely sideways for most of the year as reports have suggested that the economy is strengthening.
abstract: Stock market rises for fourth straight day after a report on hiring provides an additional encouraging sign that the economy is emerging from its winter slump.
lead_paragraph: The market has turned higher this week after moving largely sideways for most of the year as reports have suggested that the economy is strengthening.

headline.main: Market Rises a 4th Day, on Good Job News
headline.print_headline: Market Rises a 4th Day, on Good Job News
